message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
public void printShapes(ArrayList<String> numbers){
    Iterator<Shape> iter = this.shapes.iterator();
    for(String s:numbers){
        if(iter.hasNext()){
            Shape shape = iter.next();
            shape.printMe(s);
        }
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: You are creating a new iterator in every iteration of your loop, which always starts at the beginning of your shapes list. You should create the iterator outside of the loop and then call next() on it inside the loop. This way, each call to next() will give you the next shape in the list.
